input.sentences: we decided to take a group tour this weekend .
we visited many areas including this ancient building .
it was extremely large and you can tell it was old .
everyone was tired and ended up relaxing at the beach .
output.sentences: We decided to take the family on a tour.
The area we visited had a lot of old, crumbling buildings.
Let's leave here and go to the beach.
I'm going to just stay here with the rest of the family and relax on the beach.
